name: XCTestSuite
desc: A collection of test cases to manage as a test suite.

items.name: class var `default`: XCTestSuite
items.desc: Creates a suite of test suites that represents all test case methods in the current runtime.

items.name: init(name: String)
items.desc: Creates a test suite with the specified name.

items.name: init(forBundlePath: String)
items.desc: Creates a test suite with the bundle at the specified path.

items.name: init(forTestCaseClass: AnyClass)
items.desc: Creates a test suite that contains all test methods in the specified class.

items.name: init(forTestCaseWithName: String)
items.desc: Creates a test suite that contains a test case with the specified name.

items.name: func addTest(XCTest)
items.desc: Adds a test to the test suite.

items.name: var tests: [XCTest]
items.desc: All tests currently in the test suite.
